description: This protocol provides an efficient and rapid way to concentrate proteins present in supernatants using Vivaspin columns (3,000 MWCO).
before_start:
Prepare a 25 mM Ambic (Ammonium bicarbonate) solution:

19.77 g Ambic in 10 ml Ultrapure H2O.
warning: Ambic is hazardous for the environment, check MSDS sheet to handle and discard waste.
manuscript_citation: Dubourg A, Xia D, Winpenny JP, Naimi SA, Bouzid M, Sexton DW, Wastling JM, Hunter PR, Tyler KM, Array. GigaScience 7(3). doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giy003

source_data.description: Assess protein concentration before protocol.

source_data.annotation: See BCA assay Protocol in Protocol 'Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining'.

source_data.protocol_name: Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining
source_data.protocol_name_html: Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining
source_data.description: This protocol provides an efficient way to observe proteins in samples.
source_data.before_start: Prepare acrylamide gels a few hours before running the gels; acrylamide percentage depends on protein sizes. Prepare SDS-PAGE buffers beforehand as well.
source_data.warning: Acrylamide is carcinogenic and should be handled and disposed of accordingly to MSDS sheet and Health and Safety regulation.
source_data.manuscript_citation: Dubourg A, Xia D, Winpenny JP, Naimi SA, Bouzid M, Sexton DW, Wastling JM, Hunter PR, Tyler KM, Array. GigaScience 7(3). doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giy003

authors_list.affiliation: University of East Anglia, Norwich, UK

components.data: Load proteins with loading buffer (containing loading dye) in a 3:1 ratio in Eppendorf tubes, then boil samples for 5 min at 100°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Load proteins with loading buffer (containing loading dye) in a 3:1 ratio in Eppendorf tubes, then boil samples for 5 min at 100°C.

components.data: Load 20 µl of protein samples and a protein standard molecular weight marker in gels placed in a vertical gel tank system filled with 1x running buffer. Run gels at 100 volts for 2 hours at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Load 20 µl of protein samples and a protein standard molecular weight marker in gels placed in a vertical gel tank system filled with 1x running buffer. Run gels at 100 volts for 2 hours at room temperature.

components.data: After electrophoresis, immerse gels in a fixing solution bath for 30 min on a rotary shaker. (fixation 1/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After electrophoresis, immerse gels in a fixing solution bath for 30 min on a rotary shaker. (fixation 1/2)

components.data: Immerse gels in 40 ml of pre-diluted SYPRO solution and incubate overnight, protected from the light on a rotary shaker at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immerse gels in 40 ml of pre-diluted SYPRO solution and incubate overnight, protected from the light on a rotary shaker at room temperature.

components.data: Wash gels with a washing solution for 30 min on a rotary shaker at room temperature, in a container protecting gels from the light.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash gels with a washing solution for 30 min on a rotary shaker at room temperature, in a container protecting gels from the light.

source_data.body: Collect SYPRO solution in a specific container waste and follow MSDS and health and safety regulation to discard.

components.data: Immerse gels in ultrapure water and wash for 5 min at room temperature on a rotary shaker, in a container protecting gels from the light. (wash 1/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immerse gels in ultrapure water and wash for 5 min at room temperature on a rotary shaker, in a container protecting gels from the light. (wash 1/2)

source_data.body: Collect washing buffer in a properly labeled container and follow health and safety regulation to discard.

source_data.description: Read gels under UV machine.

source_data.body: Wear required protecting gear and discard gels in a acrylamide-specific container to be discarded following health and safety regulation.

components.data: Repeat the fixation one more time; immerse gels in a fixing solution bath for 30 min on a rotary shaker. (fixation 2/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat the fixation one more time; immerse gels in a fixing solution bath for 30 min on a rotary shaker. (fixation 2/2)

components.data: Immerse gels in ultrapure water and wash for 5 min at room temperature on a rotary shaker, in a container protecting gels from the light. (wash 2/2)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immerse gels in ultrapure water and wash for 5 min at room temperature on a rotary shaker, in a container protecting gels from the light. (wash 2/2)

source_data.body: Collect washing buffer in a properly labeled container and follow health and safety regulation to discard.

components.data: Transfer sample in Vivaspin column and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer sample in Vivaspin column and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 2 of Concentration of Giardia supernatant proteins
source_data.annotation: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).
source_data.thread_text: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).
source_data.body: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).

components.data: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 3 of Concentration of Giardia supernatant proteins
source_data.annotation: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).
source_data.thread_text: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).
source_data.body: Make sure the tube is orientated as required and shown in the Vivaspin protocol (VivaProducts).

components.data: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.

components.data: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard liquid waste and add 1 ml of 25 mM Ambic and centrifuge 30 minutes at 12,000 rcf.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 5 of Concentration of Giardia supernatant proteins
source_data.annotation: This step is optional and is for samples that were in media containing phenole red
source_data.thread_text: This step is optional and is for samples that were in media containing phenole red
source_data.body: This step is optional and is for samples that were in media containing phenole red

components.data: Discard liquid waste and add 50 µl of 25 mM Ambic, incubate at room temperature for one hour and centrifuge at 3,000 rpm for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard liquid waste and add 50 µl of 25 mM Ambic, incubate at room temperature for one hour and centrifuge at 3,000 rpm for 2 minutes.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 6 of Concentration of Giardia supernatant proteins
source_data.annotation: Make sure to flip the column into clean cap before adding Ambic, see Vivaspin columns protocol.
source_data.thread_text: Make sure to flip the column into clean cap before adding Ambic, see Vivaspin columns protocol.
source_data.body: Make sure to flip the column into clean cap before adding Ambic, see Vivaspin columns protocol.

components.data: Run BCA assay and SDS-PAGE to check on protein concentration and protein degradation respectively. Store samples at -20C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run BCA assay and SDS-PAGE to check on protein concentration and protein degradation respectively. Store samples at -20C.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 7 of Concentration of Giardia supernatant proteins
source_data.annotation: See protocols 'Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining' and 'Proteomics Analysis'.
source_data.thread_text: See protocols 'Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining' and 'Proteomics Analysis'.
source_data.body: See protocols 'Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) with Sypro straining' and 'Proteomics Analysis'.

source_data.description: This protocol provides an efficient and standardized way to prepare samples ready for mass spec analysis.
source_data.before_start: Prepare solutions as described in the steps.
source_data.manuscript_citation: Dubourg A, Xia D, Winpenny JP, Naimi SA, Bouzid M, Sexton DW, Wastling JM, Hunter PR, Tyler KM, Array. GigaScience 7(3). doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giy003

collections.protocol_name_html: Giardia Secretome Highlights Secreted Tenascins as a Key Component of Pathogenesis

source_data.authors: Audrey Dubourg,Dong Xia,John P Winpenny,Suha Al Naimi,Maha Bouzid,Darren W Sexton,Jonathan M Wastling,Paul R Hunter,Kevin M Tyler

authors_list.name: Kevin M Tyler
authors_list.affiliation: University of East Anglia, Norwich, UK

components.data: Dilute the amount of protein needed, taking into account complexity, into 25mM AmBic. Small Eppendorf tube preferred.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the amount of protein needed, taking into account complexity, into 25mM AmBic. Small Eppendorf tube preferred.
Add 10µL of 1% (w/v) RapiGest (~0.05% (w/v) final).
Heat at 80°C, 10minutes, vortex briefly at 5min.

components.data: Spin quickly to return liquid to the bottom of the tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin quickly to return liquid to the bottom of the tube.

components.data: Add 10 µL of a 9.2mg/mL solution of DTT (~3 mM final). Vortex mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10 µL of a 9.2mg/mL solution of DTT (~3 mM final). Vortex mix.
Incubate for 60°C, 10minutes.

components.data: Cool to RT and quickly spin to return liquid to the bottom of the tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cool to RT and quickly spin to return liquid to the bottom of the tube.

components.data: Add 10 µL of a 33mg/mL solution of iodoacetamide (~9 mM final). Vortex.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10 µL of a 33mg/mL solution of iodoacetamide (~9 mM final). Vortex.
Incubate at RT, IN THE DARK for 30min.

components.data: Add trypsin to 50:1 protein:trypsin ratio. Incubate 12-16h (overnight) at 37°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add trypsin to 50:1 protein:trypsin ratio. Incubate 12-16h (overnight) at 37°C.

components.data: Analyze peptide mixtures on either nanoACQUITY-nLC system (Waters MS technologies) or Ultimate 3000 nano system (Thermo Fisher Scientific) followed by an LTQ-Orbitrap Velos (ThermoFisher Scientific) mass spectrometer or a Q-Exactive mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Analyze peptide mixtures on either nanoACQUITY-nLC system (Waters MS technologies) or Ultimate 3000 nano system (Thermo Fisher Scientific) followed by an LTQ-Orbitrap Velos (ThermoFisher Scientific) mass spectrometer or a Q-Exactive mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific).
